author: desruisseaux
msg: Renamed the internal "MarshalContext" class as "Context", for differentiating from the public
"MarshalContext" class and for anticipating usage in slightly wider cases than just (un)marshalling.

author: andygumbrecht
msg: Technically a bug in maven-versions-plugin (http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MVERSIONS-201), but fix groupId references that contain a property.
Running mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=[version] will now work.
